label: dueDateTime
comment: The date, time, date time, or other date time value of the due date specified by these trade payment terms.

domainIncludes.comment: The information that enables the reconciliation of a payment with the item(s) that the payment is intended to settle, for example a commercial invoice.
Terms and conditions by which payment has been or will be made for trade purposes.
A discharge of obligations in respect of funds or securities, transferred through one of several payments, between two or more parties.
